item.title: HP – OfficeJet Pro 7740 Wireless All-In-One Inkjet Printer – White
item.description: HP – OfficeJet Pro 7740 Wireless All-In-One Inkjet Printer – White
item.content:encoded:
Go wider with this HP OfficeJet Pro wide format all-in-one printer. Outstanding print clarity and the capability of going full bleed delivers professional-looking documentation and marketing material straight from this office printer. Legendary flexibility ensures this HP OfficeJet Pro wide format all-in-one printer keeps your office running at full speed.

Prints up to 22 ISO ppm* in black, up to 18 ISO ppm* in color
To generate documents quickly.

Be sure you have the right cartridge
Enter your printer’s model number into our Ink and Toner Finder to find compatible cartridges. Get started ›

4-in-1 functionality
Copies, faxes, prints and scans to accommodate your business and personal needs.

Wireless and mobile printing capability
Connect this printer to your home or office network with built-in Ethernet or wireless LAN. Plus, print from your mobile device with the free HP ePrint app or Apple AirPrint.

Up to 4800 x 1200 dpi (dots per inch) color resolution
High resolution for producing incredible quality and detail in documents and photos. Up to 600 x 600 dpi when printing black only.

1 black and 1 tri-color print cartridge
Let you refill black and color tanks individually.

Large paper trays for your high-volume printing
Reload less often with the 500-sheet input tray and 75-sheet output tray.

2.65″ CGD (color graphics display) touch screen
Use the intuitive touch screen to print, store files and access business apps** directly from the printer.

USB port for simple connectivity
1 high-speed USB 2.0 port offers a standard connection to your PC or a simple way to plug in and print with a USB drive, camera or other device.

Built-in duplex printing
Print on both sides of the page without turning it over manually, to minimize your printing costs and help the environment.

Dynamic Security
This printer uses dynamic security, which may be updated periodically by firmware updates. The printer is intended to be used solely with cartridges using an original HP chip. Cartridges using a non‐HP chip may not function or may cease to function.

Apple, the Apple logo, iPod, iPad and Apple AirPrint are trademarks of Apple Computer, Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

*Print speeds vary with use. See manufacturer for info on print speeds.

Source

item.title: HP – OfficeJet Pro 6978 Wireless All-In-One Instant Ink Ready Printer – Black
item.description: HP – OfficeJet Pro 6978 Wireless All-In-One Instant Ink Ready Printer – Black
item.content:encoded:
Bring fast, reliable printing, scanning and copying to your workstation with this HP OfficeJet Pro all-in-one printer. Wireless technology lets you print important documents directly from your laptop or smartphone, and the fast printing speeds deliver beautiful documents in just seconds. Boasting a 35-page two-sided document feeder, this HP OfficeJet Pro all-in-one printer makes tackling paperwork easy.

Easy Replenish
With a printer set up for Easy Replenish, you’ll automatically receive shipments of the ink you need. The printer monitors its own ink levels, so you’ll only receive ink when you need it.

Be sure you have the right cartridge
Enter your printer’s model number into our Ink and Toner Finder to find compatible cartridges. Get started ›

Works with Amazon Alexa
Ask your compatible device (separate device required) to print custom shopping lists, to-do lists, as well as a variety of coloring activities and crossword puzzles.

Works with Google Assistant
Ask your compatible device (separate device required) to print your Google Calendar, templates for custom calendars and checklists, as well as select activities and word games.

Works with Cortana
Ask your compatible device (separate device required) to print coloring pages, as well as various puzzles, comics, and coloring activities.

Prints up to 20 ISO ppm* in black, up to 11 ISO ppm* in color
To generate documents quickly.

4-in-1 functionality
Copies, faxes, prints and scans to accommodate your business and personal needs.

Wireless and mobile printing capability
Connect this printer to your home or office network with built-in Ethernet or wireless LAN. Plus, print from your mobile device with the free HP ePrint app or Apple® AirPrint.

Color resolution up to 600 x 1200 dpi
Along with a black-and-white resolution up to 600 x 1200 dpi produces clear, vibrant images.

4 individual print cartridges are economical
Only replace ink cartridges (black, cyan, magenta and yellow) when a color runs out.

225-sheet input tray
With 60-sheet output tray. The 35-page auto document feeder enables quick paper reloading.

2.65″ touch screen
Makes operation simple.

HP Instant Ink Compatible
Save up to 50% on Ink with Instant Ink

More connectivity options
Built-in memory card slots and USB 2.0 let you simply plug in your memory card, USB drive, camera or other device and print.

Built-in duplex printing
Print on both sides of the page without turning it over manually, to minimize your printing costs and help the environment.

More print, copy and scan solutions
Automatically print 2-sided documents, scan documents to your computer or directly to e-mail and more.

Copies up to 13 cpm* in black, up to 7 ISO cpm* in color
To ensure efficient performance.

Copy resolution up to 600 x 600 dpi
To generate copies quickly.

Scanner with color CIS (contact image sensor)
Allows you to scan documents in up to 1200 dpi optical resolution to reproduce exact colors and large documents.

Apple, the Apple logo, iPod, iPad and Apple AirPrint are trademarks of Apple Computer, Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

*Requires a high-speed Internet connection.

*Print speeds vary with use. See manufacturer for info on print speeds.

Source

item.title: HP – LaserJet Pro M102w Black-and-White Wireless Laser Printer – White
item.description: HP – LaserJet Pro M102w Black-and-White Wireless Laser Printer – White
item.content:encoded:
p

rint professional-quality documents with this HP LaserJet Pro printer. Send documents from a mobile device via AirPrint, ePrint, Wi-Fi Direct or Google CloudPrint 2.0, and they’re automatically resized for printing. JetIntelligence toner cartridges in this HP Laser JetPro printer provide clear, sharp graphics and text, and the auto on/off feature saves energy.

Be sure you have the right cartridge
Enter your printer’s model number into our Ink and Toner Finder to find compatible cartridges. Get started ›

Works with Amazon Alexa
Ask your compatible device (separate device required) to print custom shopping lists, to-do lists, as well as a variety of coloring activities and crossword puzzles.

Works with Google Assistant
Ask your compatible device (separate device required) to print your Google Calendar, templates for custom calendars and checklists, as well as select activities and word games.

Laser printers are best for high-volume printing
They handle large volumes quickly and at a low cost per page. Toner (powder) is used instead of ink, so you get smudge-free images and text.

Wireless and mobile printing capability
Connect computers or devices easily with built-in Wi-Fi. Plus, print from your mobile device and from select online cloud services with HP ePrint, Mopria, Google Cloud Print or Apple® AirPrint.

1200 dpi (dots per inch) for excellent print quality
Medium resolution for producing sharp text, even at 6 points or smaller, and graphics with thin lines and curves.

Single black toner cartridge
Offers high volume and features JetIntelligence technology.

Large paper trays for your high-volume printing
Reload less often with the 150-sheet input tray, 10-sheet priority slot and 100-sheet output tray.

Apple, the Apple logo, iPod, iPad and Apple AirPrint are trademarks of Apple Computer, Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

Print speeds vary with use. See manufacturer for information on print speeds.

Source

item.title: HP – LaserJet Pro M479fdw Wireless Color All-In-One Laser Printer – White
item.description: HP – LaserJet Pro M479fdw Wireless Color All-In-One Laser Printer – White
item.content:encoded:
Winning in business means working smarter. This HP Color LaserJet Pro M479fdw printer is designed to let you focus your time where it’s most effective – growing your business and staying ahead of the competition.

Prints up to 27 ISO ppm* in black, up to 27 ISO ppm* in color
Produces documents quickly.

Be sure you have the right cartridge
Enter your printer’s model number into our Ink and Toner Finder to find compatible cartridges. Get started ›

Ideal for high-volume printing
This laser printer handles large volumes quickly and at a low cost per page. Toner (powder) is used instead of ink, so you get smudge-free images and text.

Wireless and mobile printing capability
Connect this printer to your home or office network with built-in Ethernet or wireless LAN. Plus, print from your mobile device with the free HP ePrint app or Apple AirPrint.**

Apple AirPrint enabled
Allows Apple iPad and iPhone printing.**

Toner family number
Works with HP 414A and HP 414X toner cartridges.

Print speed
Prints up to 27 ISO ppm* in black, up to 27 ISO ppm* in color. First page out as fast as 9.5 seconds in black, as fast as 11.1 seconds in color.

Page yield
Four pre-installed introductory HP LaserJet toner cartridges yield up to 2,400 pages in black, up to 1,200 pages in color.

600 dpi (dots per inch) for good print quality
Sufficient resolution for producing quality documents and photos.

Four individual print cartridges are economical
Only replace an ink cartridge (black, cyan, magenta, or yellow) when its color runs out.

Large paper trays for high-volume printing and copying
Reload less often with the 250-sheet input tray, 50-sheet multipurpose tray, and 150-sheet output tray. Copy, scan, or fax multiple pages easily with the 50-sheet automatic document feeder.

4.3″ touch screen
Lets you tackle tasks quickly and effortlessly.

USB port for simple connectivity
The high-speed USB 2.0 port offers a standard connection to your PC or a simple way to plug in and print from a USB drive, camera, or other devices.

Built-in duplex printing
Print on both sides of the page without turning it over manually to minimize your printing costs and help the environment.

Dynamic Security
This printer uses dynamic security, which may be updated periodically by firmware updates. The printer is intended to be used solely with cartridges using an original HP chip. Cartridges using a non‐HP chip may not function or may cease to function.

Apple, the Apple logo, iPod, iPad and Apple AirPrint are trademarks of Apple Computer, Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

* Print speeds vary with use. See manufacturer for the information on print speeds.

** Requires a high-speed Internet connection.

Source

item.title: HP LaserJet Pro MFP M29W – White and Adobe – Creative Cloud Photography Plan 20GB (1-Year Subscription)
item.description: HP LaserJet Pro MFP M29W – White and Adobe – Creative Cloud Photography Plan 20GB (1-Year Subscription)
item.content:encoded:
Upgrade office supplies with this HP LaserJet Pro printer. Its compact size easily fits into offices where space is a premium, and the HP Smart app boosts productivity by letting you scan, print and order supplies through compatible smartphones. This HP LaserJet Pro printer creates up to 19 pages per minute so you can complete tasks quickly.

Prints up to 19 ISO ppm* in black
Produces documents quickly.

Ink and Toner Finder
Enter your printer’s model number into HP’s Ink and Toner Finder to find compatible cartridges. Get started ›

Ideal for high-volume printing
This laser printer handles large volumes quickly and at a low cost per page. Toner (powder) is used instead of ink, so you get smudge-free images and text.

Wireless and mobile printing capability
Connect this printer with wireless LAN. Plus, print from your mobile device with Apple AirPrint, Google Cloud Print 2.0, Wi-Fi Direct or HP Smart App.

Toner Family Number
HP 44A Original Black (EMEA); HP 48A Original Black (ROW); HP 47A Original Black (CH/IN); LaserJet Toner Cartridge CF244A (EMEA); LaserJet Toner Cartridge CF248A (ROW); LaserJet Toner Cartridge CF247A (CH/IN).

Fast print speed
Provides fast print speed in black: ISO, A4 up to 18 ppm and ISO, letter up to 19 ppm.

500-page yield for comfortable work
With HP original black LaserJet toner cartridge.

600 dpi (dots per inch) for good print quality
Sufficient resolution for producing good quality documents.

Standard paper handling
150-sheet input and 100-sheet output capacity.

1.0″ Icon LCD graphic display
Easily input commands for printing, copying and scanning directly from the printer.

One USB port for simple connectivity
One high-speed USB 2.0 port offers a standard connection to your PC.

More copy and scan solutions
Automatically copy documents, scan documents to your computer or directly to e-mail and more.

Apple, the Apple logo, iPod, iPad and Apple AirPrint are trademarks of Apple Computer, Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

Requires a high-speed Internet connection.

* Print speeds vary with use. See manufacturer for the information on print speeds.

Source

item.title: HP – OfficeJet Pro 9025e Wireless All-In-One Inkjet Printer with 6 months of Instant Ink Included with HP+ – White
item.description: HP – OfficeJet Pro 9025e Wireless All-In-One Inkjet Printer with 6 months of Instant Ink Included with HP+ – White
item.content:encoded:
The HP OfficeJet Pro 9025e delivers the fastest speeds, 500-sheet paper capacity, and up to 2x faster scan speeds. It includes the optional HP+ Smart Printing System that keeps itself up to date, secure, and ready to print from virtually anywhere at any time. Optional HP+ system requires an HP account, internet connection, and use of only Original HP Ink for the life of the printer.

Best for small businesses and home offices
Print professional-quality color documents like presentations, brochures and flyers

Upgraded features
Fast color printing, up to 2x faster scan speeds, copy, fax, auto 2-sided printing and scanning, mobile and wireless printing, auto document feeder, and print from USB

HP+ Smart Printing System
The optional HP+ system enables your printer to think ahead so it’s more secure, more productive and ready when you are. Requires an HP account, internet connection and use of only Original HP Ink for the life of the printer.

6 months of Instant Ink included plus an extra year of HP warranty)
when you activate optional HP+ and Instant Ink when setting up your printer. Only with HP+.

Fast print speeds
Print up to 24 pages per minute in black and 20 pages per minute in color

Dual band Wi-Fi
Self-healing Wi-FiTM automatically detects and resolves connection issues

HP Smart app
Print, scan and copy from your phone—from anywhere. Get advanced features for 24 months with HP+.

Security essentials
Protect sensitive data with basic encryption, password protection, Wi-Fi security and document protection. Get enhanced cloud-based security features with HP+.

Ink delivered before you run out
Never run out of ink with an optional Instant Ink subscription. 6 months included with HP+. Credit card required; change or cancel anytime

Source

item.title: MAXIFY GX6021 WIRELESS
item.description: The MAXIFY GX6021 Wireless MegaTank Small Office Inkjet All-In-One Color Printer offers high-quality printing, scanning, copying, and faxing in one compact device. With wireless connectivity, high-capacity ink tanks, and fast print speeds, this printer is perfect for small offices.
item.content:encoded:
The MAXIFY GX6021 Wireless MegaTank Small Office Inkjet All-In-One Color Printer offers high-quality printing, scanning, copying, and faxing in one compact device. With wireless connectivity, high-capacity ink tanks, and fast print speeds, this printer is perfect for small offices.

  • Print at speeds of up to 24 pages per minute in black and up to 15.5 pages per minute in color.
  • Produce high-quality prints with a resolution of up to 600 x 1200 dpi.
  • Enjoy the convenience of mobile printing options, including AirPrint, Mopria Print Service, Easy PhotoPrint Editor App, PIXMA Cloud Link, and the Creative Park App.
  • Achieve voice-activated operation with compatibility for Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
  • Swiftly copy legal- and letter-size documents in approximately 12 seconds (color).
  • Copy features include Frame Erase Copy, Fit-to-Page, Reduction/Zoom Copy, and more.
  • Scan features include Multi-Page PDF, Unsharp mask, Rotate, and more.

Source

item.title: INKVESTMENT TANK MFC-J5855DW
item.description: The INKvestment Tank MFC-J5855DW Inkjet All-In-One Color Printer offers high-quality printing, scanning, copying, and faxing with low-cost ink The INKvestment Tank system ensures you have plenty of ink to handle large print jobs without frequent replacements.
item.content:encoded:
The INKvestment Tank MFC-J5855DW Inkjet All-In-One Color Printer offers high-quality printing, scanning, copying, and faxing with low-cost ink The INKvestment Tank system ensures you have plenty of ink to handle large print jobs without frequent replacements.

  • Prints up to 30 pages per minute (ppm) in both black and color.
  • Delivers impressive images and text with a high-resolution print quality of up to 4800 x 1200 dpi class.
  • Copy at a speed of up to 25 ipm in black and 16 ipm in color, maintaining a resolution of up to 4800 x 1200 dpi.

Source

item.title: MAXIFY GX7021 WIRELESS
item.description: The MAXIFY GX7021 Wireless MegaTank All-In-One Color Printer offers high-quality printing, scanning, copying, and faxing with low-cost ink. With wireless connectivity, high-capacity ink tanks, and fast print speeds, this printer is perfect for small offices. Enjoy reliable.
item.content:encoded:
The MAXIFY GX7021 Wireless MegaTank All-In-One Color Printer offers high-quality printing, scanning, copying, and faxing with low-cost ink. With wireless connectivity, high-capacity ink tanks, and fast print speeds, this printer is perfect for small offices. Enjoy reliable

  •  Enjoy cable-free convenience with built-in wireless (802.11b/g/n) connection, and take advantage of Ethernet connectivity for added flexibility.
  • This wireless all-in-one printer supports mobile printing, making printing from your mobile devices easy.
  •  It supports AirPrint, Mopria, Easy PhotoPrint Editor app, PIXMA Cloud Link, and Creative Park app.
  • Print documents at a speed of up to 24 pages per minute in black and 15.5 pages per minute in color, ensuring your work is done efficiently.
  • With a maximum resolution of up to 1200 x 600 dpi, your documents and images are crisp and clear.
  • The all-in-one ink tank printer can copy documents at a rate of up to 5 copies per minute, with a copy resolution of up to 1200 dpi.

Source

item.title: DCP-B7500D MULTIFUNCTION
item.description: The DCP-B7500D Multifunction Monochrome Laser Printer offers high-speed printing, scanning, and copying in one reliable device. With automatic two-sided printing and robust security features, this printer is perfect for home offices and small businesses. Its compact design and energy-efficient technology ensure maximum productivity and cost savings.
item.content:encoded:
The DCP-B7500D Multifunction Monochrome Laser Printer offers high-speed printing, scanning, and copying in one reliable device. With automatic two-sided printing and robust security features, this printer is perfect for home offices and small businesses. Its compact design and energy-efficient technology ensure maximum productivity and cost savings.

  • Printer Type : Laser Printer ; Functionality : Print, Scan & Copy
  • Print Output : Monochrome
  • Connectivity – USB
  • Scanner Type – Flatbed
  • Scanner (if exist): Yes
  • Scanner resolution (if exists) – Up to 19200 x 19200 dpi (interpolated), Up to 1200 x 1200 dpi (from Scanner Glass)

Source
